body_html: @carpodaster yes, I know. it's very frustrating, for devs and orgas as well as students 😖For example, the help page said that you could change team github and twitter info on your edit profile page, but as it turns out, this cannot be done until you are a selected team. Small issues like this do slow us down, so maybe this is a good point for why we might want to try to have better documentation for the teams app. I'd love to hear your input on this! And yes, I know that for many people tests = documentation ;)

body: @carpodaster yes, I know. it's very frustrating, for devs and orgas as well as students 😖For example, the help page said that you could change team github and twitter info on your edit profile page, but as it turns out, this cannot be done until you are a selected team. Small issues like this do slow us down, so maybe this is a good point for why we might want to try to have better documentation for the teams app. I'd love to hear your input on this! And yes, I know that for many people tests = documentation ;)
